title: Bit Toggle Function
description:
BIT_TOGGLE_DW inverts a specifed bit at IN.
BIT_TOGGLE_DW(2#0000_1111, 2) = 2#0000_1011
BIT_TOGGLE_DW(2#0000_1111, 7) = 2#1000_1111
name: BIT_TOGGLE_DW

input.name: IN
input.description: The input DWORD value where the bit will be toggled.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit to be toggled, starting from 0 for the least significant bit.

return_value.description: The resulting DWORD value after the specified bit has been toggled.
